name: Shape Your Way
description:
You are a Shape,A Triangle trapped in a maze.Jump and roll your way through the maze fillled with difficult precision based puzzles.You will only escape if you understand yourself and the world around you.Lets see if you can Shape your way!

Features
  • Traverse the maze to find the exit.
  • Special delay based timing platforms to test your patience.
  • You will need some good platformer skills.
  • Evil shapes are not scary and they wont hurt but they can help/annoy you.
  • Collect checkpoints along the way to restart from that point anytime.
  • If you are stuck then check out the help section in the main menu .
  • If you ever feel like rage quitting don't worry there's a button for that too.
Controls

Move -[ Arrow Keys]/[WASD]

Jump - [Space]

Install instructions

Run the ShapeYourWay.exe file after extracting the zip file.
